title: Stochastic loop equations
abstract: Stochastic quantization is applied to derivation of the equations for the Wilson loops and generating functionals of the Wilson loops in the large-N limit. These equations are treated both in the coordinate and momentum representations. In the first case the connection of the suggested approach with the problem of random closed contours and supersymmetric quantum mechanics is established, and the equation for the Quenched Master Field Wilson loop is derived. The regularized version of one of the obtained equations is presented and applied to derivation of the equation for the bilocal field correlator. The momentum loop dynamics is also investigated.
